name: Jule (Haha_xddd_)
description:
Hello Average Game Enjoyer and Welcome to the Jule Page.

This Game is the best I can do. I am sorry for everything you must go trough playing this game. 

I am truly sorry for everythang that comes when starting the .exe file.                        

The Moment you first download and than open the .rar file (with for example: https://www.win-rar.com) is making me shiver.If you than Open the "Jule.exe" and play after it has loaded will let you see the sadest piece of development.

The Game is made in Unreal Engine 4. I first tried UE5 but changed to UE4 to avoid Software Problems. Almost all Features are from the Marketplace. I did some of my own programming and followed alot of Tutorials. My Goal is to make a Game that I like. I dont want to show off my dev. Skills.
